section.heading: Assistance with discovery.
section.text: A tribunal of the District may:

para.text: Request a tribunal of another state to assist in obtaining discovery; and
Upon request, compel a person over whom it has jurisdiction to respond to a discovery order issued by a tribunal of another state.

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Former § 46-303.18 has been recodified as § 46-303.19 by D.C. Law 16-137, § 2(c)(19).
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 318 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
